model.tree - package model.tree
 
mouseClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementRemoveState
Invokes a command to remove the shape under the cursor.
mouseClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementSelectState
Toggles the selected state of the element under the cursor, or if there's none, deselects all elements.
mouseClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementState
Called when the mouse is clicked and this state is active.

Called when the mouse is clicked.
mouseDown(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementEllipseState
Starts a new ellipse and adds it to the editor view.
mouseDown(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementLassoSelectState
Starts a new lasso selection and records the current selected state of all shapes.
mouseDown(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementMoveState
Picks the shape under the cursor (unless it is part of the current selection, in which case the whole selection will be moved) and initializes the composite command to move only that one.
mouseDown(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementRectangleState
Creates a new rectangle and adds it to the folder's temporary shapes.
mouseDown(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementState
Called when the mouse button is held and this state is active
mouseDown(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementTriangleState
Starts a new triangle and adds it to the editor view.
mouseDrag(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementEllipseState
Updates the editor view with the new dimensions of the ellipse.
mouseDrag(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementLassoSelectState
Updates the lasso selection bounds and selects/deselects elements based on if they are inside or not.
mouseDrag(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementMoveState
Performs the translation of the shape(s) and updates the commands with the new positions.
mouseDrag(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementRectangleState
Updates the rectangle's parameters and repaints the view.
mouseDrag(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementState
Called when the mouse is dragged and this state is active
mouseDrag(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementTriangleState
Updates the editor view with the new dimensions of the triangle.
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class state.GraphicElementStateManager
Called when the mouse is dragged over the associated view.
